title: What happens next in The Leftovers season 2: "We're gonna shake things up" - US TV
text: function onTemplateLoaded(experienceID) { bcExp = brightcove.getExperience(experienceID); modVP = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.VIDEO_PLAYER); modExp = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.EXPERIENCE); modCon = bcExp.getModule(APIModules.CONTENT); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.BEGIN, onVideoStart); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.STOP, onVideoStop); modVP.addEventListener(BCMediaEvent.PROGRESS, onVideoProgress); } #_containermyExperience4533028951001 { height: 100%; } // InSkin integration parameters: InSkinParams['myInSkin14533028951001'] = { 'srv_SectionID': '', 'srv_SectionIDPlay': '123757', 'srv_Keywords': '', 'plr_ContentID': 'myExperience4533028951001', 'plr_ContentType': 'BRIGHTCOVE3', 'plr_ContentW': 558, 'plr_ContentH': 314, 'plr_NoSkinContentResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinContentW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinContentH': 348, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinResize': true, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinW': 618, 'plr_NoSkinInSkinH': 348, 'plr_ResizeOnHideSkin': true, 'plr_HideSkinOnExternalAd': 'all', 'plr_ShowSkinAfterExternalAd': true, 'cnt_SmartPlayer': true }; // create the InSkin object: var InSkinObject4533028951001 = new InSkin.Base('myInSkin14533028951001'); brightcove.createExperiences(); if (!navigator.userAgent.match(/Android/i)) { InSkinObject4533028951001.init(); ai_type="video"; } The Leftovers returns to US television tonight - but what can fans expect from season two? Cast and crew of the haunting HBO drama reveal all in a Digital Spy exclusive clip, taken from the Complete First Season box-set.Damon Lindelof - co-creator - hints that new episodes will "shake things up", adding: "I don't want to do any of the obvious."Series stars Justin Theroux (Kevin Garvey, Jr.) and Amy Brenneman (Laurie Garvey) also weigh in on season two's big location shift, alongside Tom Perrotta, writer of the original novel.The Leftovers: The Complete First Season is out now on Blu-ray and DVD.The Leftovers season 1 review: Exhausting, suffocating, brilliantThe Leftovers: Was episode 3 the finest piece of TV drama in 2014?
